bg.tu_varna.sit.oop1.serialization.deserializer

Class ProgramDeserializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • bg.tu_varna.sit.oop1.serialization.deserializer.ProgramDeserializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomDeserializable<Program>

    public class ProgramDeserializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomDeserializable<Program>
    The ProgramDeserializer class implements the CustomDeserializable interface for Program objects. It provides a method to deserialize a string into a Program object.

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        public Program deserialize(java.lang.String data)
                    throws DeserializationException,
                           ProgramException,
                           SubjectException
        Deserializes the given string data into a Program object. The data has to be in a specific format.
        Specified by:
        deserialize in interface CustomDeserializable<Program>
        Parameters:
        data - The string that has to be deserialized.
        Returns:
        A Program object deserialized from the string.
        Throws:
        DeserializationException - If the string cannot be deserialized into a Program object due to missing data.
        ProgramException - If the provided program data is with wrong format.
        SubjectException - If the provided subject data is with wrong format.

      • getSubjectByCourse

        private void getSubjectByCourse(java.lang.String info,
                                Program program)
                         throws DeserializationException,
                                SubjectException,
                                ProgramException
        Extracts and sets subjects for a specific year of study of a program.
        Parameters:
        info - The string containing subject information for a specific course.
        program - The Program object to which the extracted subjects will be added.
        Throws:
        DeserializationException - If the string cannot be properly parsed into subjects due to missing data.
        SubjectException - If the provided subject data is with wrong format.
        ProgramException

      • getSubjectsCollection

        private java.util.HashSet<Subject> getSubjectsCollection(java.lang.String[] subjectsStrings)
                                                  throws SubjectException
        Parses an array of subject strings into a collection of Subject objects.
        Parameters:
        subjectsStrings - An array of strings, each representing a subject.
        Returns:
        A collection of Subject objects.
        Throws:
        SubjectException - If the provided subject data is with wrong format.

      • getSubjectFromString

        private Subject getSubjectFromString(java.lang.String subjectStr)
                              throws SubjectException
        Parses a string into a Subject object.
        Parameters:
        subjectStr - The string representing the subject.
        Returns:
        A Subject object.
        Throws:
        SubjectException - If the provided subject data is with wrong format.
